ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Inputs and Stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: If you want it to do the research, I found this link when reading up on Kedge Keep.  It rocks!  And is written by a Bard.  ;) warning, its a bit long!
ygData.messageBody:
If you want it to do the research, I found this link when reading up on
Kedge Keep. It rocks! And is written by a Bard. ;)

warning, its a bit long!

http://everquest.allakhazam.com/Phreekittys_Ultimate_Guide_to_Kedge_Keep.htm

Enjoy!

Kendawen

-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher Sanders [mailto:christopher.sanders@...]
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 11:39 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Inputs and Stuff


Thanks Bril, and others for the Kedge advice. :) I'm going to see if I can
put together a group of my guildies willing to risk this place. I really
wanna do it. :)

AT

-----Original Message-----
From: Rebecca Small [mailto:rsmall@...]
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 11:11 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Inputs and Stuff


Kedge: Atonal you Do not want to be the EB for a KK group, your place is
keeping Stam up with jig and tossing in whatever else is good for group. Get
a druid to EB and time it religiously, get a mage that can summon water
stones and give everyone several to start, etc, timing the eb is of the
utmost importantce til you get ss gloves or fishbones. First floor just past
the zone in has mid 30s fishies. Remember this is a true 3D zone! Fish can
be above And below you. Stay out of the well down to the second floor til
high 30's to 40's and pretty skilled underwater group. The very bottom of
the well has a pack of really hard hitting pirahnas and there's a couple of
sharks on the second floor itself that are just as mean. The sharkskin drum
is insanely rare and does still have a lute graphic.

Tamborine: Yes, I'm 54 and still 2 coins shy of that thing! I've been
lugging that silly box around forever it seems. Finally a druid foraged the
EJ one for me during the raid on the dragon there this weekend. No failed
raiders up in Kaesora last night though. Still need to take out a scorp as
well, keep trying to talk the group into bagging one on our way into Howling
Stones but they've been in a rush to get in everytime so far. I never log in
and hang out, consequently I have a bank full of old armor and dropped
spells and assorted stuff that could be sold or traded. If I don't log the
bard in expressly to go do something, we go play twinks or move stuff
between characters and then go do something. (4 accounts between the 2 of
us, now that's addiction!)

HE Clerics: my baby cleric is a shameless twink, cleric quest armor exept
for arms and bracers. Of course it's a bit heavy but better than bronze!We
have them somewhere, just not sure which char/account! Strength is her main
issue, but I knew that as my mate is a HE cleric. She looks good though, and
that's majorly important! I can always steal the TBB from our Erudite pally
twink, hehe.

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Excalibur, Xegony
